meaningMnemonic: The <radical>servant</radical> sits on a <radical>stool</radical>, holding a piece of <radical>thread</radical>, looking very <kanji>tense</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You ask the servant why they're so <kanji>tense</kanji>, and they say they've been assigned to assassinate the <reading>Kin</reading>g (きん) of England with this piece of thread.
